text: Mary Wilson (March 6, 1944 - February 8, 2021) was an American singer. She was an original member of The Supremes. She remained in the group until 1977. She released three solo records. She also had five of her own singles. Wilson was born in Greenville, Mississippi. Wilson died on February 8, 2021 at her home in Henderson, Nevada from hypertensive heart disease at the age of 76. ==Reference== Category:African-American singers Category:American R&B; musicians Category:Singers from Mississippi Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American R&B; singers Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:Writers from Mississippi Category:Deaths from hypertension
title: Mary Wilson
